page.title: 05DAYS IN LIVES OF CHILDREN
page.content: I was going to be a bridesmaid. Mummy and Daddy went to church while we put our bridesmaids dresses on. After the wedding, people took photographs of my sister and we went in the car to have our dinner. Then we played and went home and went to bed. Nadia Styles 7 I enroled at Brownies on Tuesday and said "I promise that I'll do my best to do my duty to God and the Queen and help other people and to keep the Brownie guide law." Then I got my Scottish kelpies badge and two more badges. Claire Holmwood 7 Lindsy and I went to the cinema. We watched'101 Dalmatians' at Crawley. Afterwards we went home on the train and then watched television and went to bed. Claire Rowland 7
